column5: Chappell Creek Village Apartments is truly a place to call home. Our goal is to provide our guests with a quiet and beautiful environment. We are a gated community and boast an immaculately maintained pool and spa, fitness center, business center, and serene property. We are easily accessible from Belton, Killeen, and located close to Baylor Scott and White Medical Center, the VA Hospital, Temple Mall, I-35, and downtown Temple.
